description: Continental Explorer: Land of Harmonious Springs (III)
requirements: Light up the maps of the following areas in Fontaine: Morte Region and Erinnyes Forest.

description: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Land of Harmonious Springs (III)
requirements: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Fontaine: Morte Region and Erinnyes Forest.

Open 40 treasure chests in the Morte Region and Erinnyes Forest.
Open 80 treasure chests in the Morte Region and Erinnyes Forest.

Complete a total of 3 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Morte Region and Erinnyes Forest.

Complete a total of 9 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Morte Region and Erinnyes Forest.
Meet a mysterious fairy on Erinnyes.
primo: Complete The Wild Fairy of Erinnyes and open all of Pahsiv's treasures.

requirements: What left its name behind? What lies spread all over the valley? What reflects itself in the mirror-water? What symbolizes the lonely, world-saving sacrifice?
